クラス RectangleMeter

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      RectangleMeter

public class RectangleMeter
extends greenfoot.Actor

Allows for an interactive fillable vertical rectangle. This is accomplished by pressing the up and down arrow keys YOU PROBABLY SHOULD ***NOT*** MODIFY THIS CODE, although you can if you want to.

バージョン:
1/2016
作成者:
Stephen Blythe

コンストラクタの概要
RectangleMeter(int height)
          Build a rectangle of specifed height (and 20 width).
 
メソッドの概要
 void act()
          act - check user keypress status and modify meter accordingly
 double getFilledRatio()
          getFilledRatio returns a double representing the amount the meter is full as a ratio (i.e. a value between 0 and 1 inclusively)
 int getHeight()
          getHeight returns the height of this RectangleMeter in pixels
 int getWidth()
          getWidth returns the width of this RectangleMeter in pixels
 
クラス greenfoot.Actor から継承されたメソッド
addedToWorld, getImage, getIntersectingObjects, getNeighbours, getObjectsAtOffset, getObjectsInRange, getOneIntersectingObject, getOneObjectAtOffset, getRotation, getWorld, getWorldOfType, getX, getY, intersects, isAtEdge, isTouching, move, removeTouching, setImage, setImage, setLocation, setRotation, turn, turnTowards
 
クラス java.lang.Object から継承されたメソッド
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

コンストラクタの詳細

RectangleMeter

public RectangleMeter(int height)
Build a rectangle of specifed height (and 20 width). Initially, the rectangle is empty.

パラメータ:
height - - the requested height
メソッドの詳細

act

public void act()
act - check user keypress status and modify meter accordingly

オーバーライド:
クラス greenfoot.Actor 内の act

getFilledRatio

public double getFilledRatio()
getFilledRatio returns a double representing the amount the meter is full as a ratio (i.e. a value between 0 and 1 inclusively)

戻り値:
the ratio

getHeight

public int getHeight()
getHeight returns the height of this RectangleMeter in pixels

戻り値:
number of pixels high the meter image is

getWidth

public int getWidth()
getWidth returns the width of this RectangleMeter in pixels

戻り値:
number of pixels wide the meter image is
